abstract: The post positions were drawn Monday for all 15 of the Breeders' Cup races, which offer a combined purse of $26 million.
snippet: The post positions were drawn Monday for all 15 of the Breeders' Cup races, which offer a combined purse of $26 million.
lead_paragraph: 11:25 a.m. | Updated Prayer for Relief has developed a fever and will not race in the Classic, bringing the field to 12.

headline.main: Uncle Mo Is Favorite in Breeders' Cup Classic
